CHAT.comment: child teaches the mother to make a small figure jump up and down three times and then sit on a miniature park bench.
child teaches mother to make a figure jump over a bigger figure , run around a little figure and then sit on the bench.
child teaches mother to string beads: first a round one and then square one.

u.a: child reaches for another bead after completing practice run .
demonstrates by putting bead on tip of string
